text: Oh Min-taek (; born February 11, 1991), better known by his stage name Elo (), is a South Korean singer. He released his debut album, Eight Femmes, on August 26, 2016. ==Discography== ===Extended plays=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" ! scope="col" rowspan="2" | Title ! scope="col" rowspan="2" | Album details ! scope="col" colspan="1" style="width:5em;" | Peak chart positions ! scope="col" rowspan="2" | Sales |- !
